warning.para: idmef_data_new_uint32 is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.
idmef_data_new_uint64 is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.
idmef_data_set_uint32 is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.
idmef_data_set_uint64 is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

idmef_data_set_ptr_ref_fast ()
idmef_data_set_ptr_nodup_fast ()

idmef_data_new_char_string_dup_fast ()

idmef_data_set_char_string_ref_fast ()

refsect2.title: idmef_data_destroy ()
refsect2.para: Frees data . The buffer pointed by data will be freed if the data object is marked as _dup or _nodup.

refsect2.title: idmef_data_copy_ref ()
refsect2.para: Makes dst reference the same buffer as src .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: 0 on success, a negative value if an error occured.

refsect2.title: idmef_data_copy_dup ()
refsect2.para: Copies src to dst , including the associated buffer. This is an alternative to idmef_data_clone().

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: 0 on success, a negative value if an error occured.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the type of the embedded data.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the length of data contained within data object.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the data contained within data object.

warning.para: idmef_data_get_uint32 is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.
idmef_data_get_uint64 is deprecated and should not be used in newly-written code.

refsect2.title: idmef_data_to_string ()
refsect2.para: Formats data contained within data to be printable, and stores the result in the provided out buffer.

entry.para: Pointer to a prelude_string_t to store the formated data into.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: 0 on success, a negative value if an error occured.
